About Me

Hi, I’m Prashant Sarode

I’m a third-year B.Tech student at the School of Information Technology (SOIT), RGPV, specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIML). I’m passionate about coding in Java and building AI-driven solutions with tools like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

I enjoy crafting responsive web applications using the MERN stack and Tailwind CSS, exploring new technologies, and engaging with tech communities to grow my skills. I’m always ready to tackle challenging problems and create impactful projects!
